mapper.select:
select * from camp
order by cmp_like desc limit #{start},10
mapper.insert: insert into camp( contentId, facltNm, lctCl, allar, intro, featureNm, induty, doNm, sigunguNm, zipcode, addr1, mapX, mapY, direction, tel, homepage, manageNmpr, gnrlSiteCo, autoSiteCo, glampSiteCo, caravSiteCo, indvdlCaravSiteCo, tooltip, glampInnerFclty, caravInnerFclty, trlerAcmpnyAt, caravAcmpnyAt, toiletCo, swrmCo, wtrplCo, brazierCl, sbrsCl, sbrsEtc, posblFcltyCl, extshrCo, themaEnvrnCl, animalCmgCl, firstImageUrl ) values( #{contentId}, #{facltNm}, #{lctCl}, #{allar}, #{intro}, #{featureNm}, #{induty}, #{doNm}, #{sigunguNm}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{mapX}, #{mapY}, #{direction}, #{tel}, #{homepage}, #{manageNmpr}, #{gnrlSiteCo}, #{autoSiteCo}, #{glampSiteCo}, #{caravSiteCo}, #{indvdlCaravSiteCo}, #{tooltip}, #{glampInnerFclty}, #{caravInnerFclty}, #{trlerAcmpnyAt}, #{caravAcmpnyAt}, #{toiletCo}, #{swrmCo}, #{wtrplCo}, #{brazierCl}, #{sbrsCl}, #{sbrsEtc}, #{posblFcltyCl}, #{extshrCo}, #{themaEnvrnCl}, #{animalCmgCl}, #{firstImageUrl} )
